mapper.insert: insert into tju_provider_order (id, name, count, price, total, sdes, time, provider) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{total,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tju_provider_order set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total = #{total,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sdes = #{sdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, count, price, total, sdes, time, provider from tju_provider_order
